t: Toilets from a plumbing supply house or from a big box store or Amazon | Plumbing Forums - Professional & DIY Plumbing Forum
s: It's been said that the quality of plumbing fixtures of the same manufacturer and model vary if purchased from a big box store or a reputable plumbing supply house. Does the same hold true for toilets manufacturers like Toto, Kohler, etc?

t: Amazon plumbing fixtures vs plumbing supply store
s: Hello, we had a plumber recommend that we always get fixtures through a plumbing supply store versus one of the box stores. His reasoning was that the same fixture would have metal from a plumbing store, while the box store version would be made with plastic.
